Turning to inherited retinal disorders, our library of compounds has demonstrated dose-dependent read-through using our in vitro assay platform, acceptable intravitreal tolerability, and restored protein production in an animal model via ERSG intravitreal injection.

Our intravitreal read through approach provides the opportunity to reach the totality of the retina. To extend the duration of the delivery, our team is actively working to achieve the desired sustained release formulation. We continue our efforts exploring several biodegradable controlled release technologies and are encouraged by the intravitreal release rates achieved to-date which are consistent with our target release profile of one to three months.
